meta.title: International Size Converter Chart - Shoes & Clothing (US, UK, EU, KR)
meta.description: Easily convert shoe and clothing sizes between US, UK, Europe, Korea and Japan. Accurate chart for Men, Women, Kids and Juniors.

converter.enter_exact: Enter as many actual measurements as possible for better accuracy (mm).
converter.disclaimer_general: Sizes vary by brand. We recommend trying them on.
converter.disclaimer_clothing: Recommendation based on standard fit. Actual size may vary by material and style. Note: Men's sizes represent larger physical dimensions than Women's for the same label.
converter.how_to_foot: Stand on paper, trace your foot, and measure from heel to longest toe.
converter.how_to_chest: Measure straight across the chest, 1cm below armhole.
converter.how_to_length: From the highest point of shoulder/neck seam to the bottom hem.
converter.how_to_shoulder: Straight across the back from shoulder tip to shoulder tip.
converter.how_to_sleeve: From shoulder tip down to the cuff edge.

seo_content.measure_text_1: For shoes: Place your foot on a piece of paper and trace the outline. Measure the length from the heel to the longest toe.
seo_content.measure_text_2: For clothing: Measure your chest, waist, and hips using a flexible tape measure. Keep the tape parallel to the floor.
seo_content.faq_1_a: No, shoe sizes vary significantly by brand (e.g., Nike vs Adidas) and region. Always use a conversion chart as a guide.
seo_content.faq_2_q: What is the difference between US and UK sizes?
seo_content.faq_2_a: Typically, US men's shoe sizes are about 0.5 to 1 size larger than UK sizes.
seo_content.faq_3_q: How do I measure my foot correctly?
seo_content.faq_3_a: It's best to measure in the afternoon when your feet are slightly swollen. Wear the socks you intend to wear with the shoes.
seo_content.faq_4_q: Does this calculator work for kids?
seo_content.faq_4_a: Yes! Select the Kids (0-7y) or Juniors (8-14y) tab to find age-appropriate conversions.
